sentences.english: After the stent placement, all patients could take solid food without dysphagia.
sentences.chinese: 支架置放期间所有患儿能进食固体食物，无吞咽困难。

sentences.english: Some patients develop temporary difficulty swallowing immediately after the operation.
sentences.chinese: 一些病人在手术之后会有暂时的吞咽困难。

sentences.english: Dysphagia did not recur after 3 months followup.
sentences.chinese: 随访3个月以上，吞咽困难均缓解良好。

sentences.english: I have difficulty swallowing, pain and discomfort and occasional throwing up.
sentences.chinese: 我有吞咽困难，疼痛和不适，偶尔呕吐。

sentences.english: Results Dysphagia was relieved and tumor was controlled.
sentences.chinese: 结果吞咽困难缓解，肿瘤得到控制。

sentences.english: No correlation between the amount of retraction and postoperative dysphagia was observed.
sentences.chinese: 食管收缩量与术后吞咽困难间并无关联。

sentences.english: Is the inchoate expression of esophagus cancer to have sexual deglutition difficulty?
sentences.chinese: 食管癌的早期表现是进行性吞咽困难？

sentences.english: The major symptoms of the patients were progressive dysphagia and pain behind sternum.
sentences.chinese: 主要症状为进行性吞咽困难和胸骨后疼痛。

sentences.english: The stent placement in esophagus is an effective method to resolve dysphagia.
sentences.chinese: 食管支架置入术是解决患者吞咽困难的一种有效方法。

sentences.english: Preoperative osteophyte height did not predict which patients developed postoperative dysphagia.
sentences.chinese: 术前骨赘的高度不能猜测术后发生吞咽困难。

sentences.english: The major symptoms of the patients were progressive dysphagia and pain behind the sternum.
sentences.chinese: 主要症状为进行性吞咽困难和胸骨后疼痛。

sentences.english: Enlarging nodes may compress the esophagus causing dysphagia.
sentences.chinese: 增大的淋巴结可能会挤压食管引起吞咽困难。
他吞咽困难，只能喂些流质营养品。

sentences.english: You may find it hurts to chew and swallow.
sentences.chinese: 你可以发现咀嚼和吞咽困难。

sentences.english: Ongoing problems may persist for months afterwards, including difficulty drinking and swallowing.
sentences.chinese: 但有些问题术后会持续几个月，包括饮水及吞咽困难。

sentences.english: I can deal with the swallowing difficulty.

definition: throat sound such as choking, donkey's bray etc
